title: I can't access legends of runeterra, it just keeps crashing
body: like the title says, i've tried installing, making new acc, it just won't work i can enter my login details and press play, but that's all, does it only work for 64 bit systems or something.

replies.body: What message do you get when it crashes?

I got the same problem and the thing is there is no crash notification or error code.
It crashes as it should start the game and you see the whole game just disappearing.

I solved the problem
It crashed due my graphics driver being too new for my system.
So basicly I deinstalled my graphics driver and installed an older version - now the game works perfectly.
How do u know which are the right driver for runeterra ? Iâ€™ve the same problem
